2 March 2010

Marco Cantu’s REST Webinar

by Jim McKeeth

I didn’t get the episode with Marco and Cary edited and posted yet (came close - might still get it posted tonight when I get home).  In that episode Marco mentioned his free REST webinar which occurs at three different times tomorrow (March 3rd).  So sign-up to attend one of those sessions and download the white paper, it will be really good. Marco Cantù presents REST in Delphi and RAD Studio 2010

Let Marco Cantù show you how to get the most from RAD Studio 2010 with Representational State Transfer (REST) - a new architecture for Web services that is having a significant impact on the industry. Join Marco as he delves into the technologies involved in REST from the Delphi perspective.

Register now for March 3 6:00 AM PST / 3:00 PM CET March 3 11:00 AM PST / 2:00 PM EST March 3 8:00 PM PST / March 4 3:00 PM AEST

Topics covered in this webinar will include:

  • The Concepts Behind Representational State Transfer
  • REST technologies and Delphi
  • Creating Delphi REST clients that interface with RSS feeds, maps, and Twitter
  • Data-Oriented REST Servers
tags: delphi - free - News - REST - training - webinar
